snippet.title: ηιgнтғαвℓε • King's Quest IV Remake - Introduction
snippet.description:
Hi, this is Nightfable and I would like to show you my still unfinished introduction of The Perils of Rosella. I've done all the animations and backgrounds myself as well as the coding (regarding this particular part). 

If you're wondering when this game will be available, I honestly have no idea since I've been working at it on and off for a few years now. My children take up most of my time and it's difficult to work on my side-projects. Nevertheless, I hope you enjoy what I have put together.
